articles.title: Milky Way: Some Fun Facts about our Galaxy - India Today NE
articles.description: Our galaxy Milky Way has a lot of fascinating facts which many of us are not aware about. Here are some of them.
articles.content: About 10-15 per cent of the Milky Ways visible matter is made of dust and gas, with the rest being stars. On a clear night, the dusty ring of the Milky Way can be seen in the night sky.
